subject: Water Polo
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: For a third consecutive Olympics, the American women came up short of a gold medal in the most heartbreaking fashion with the Dutch left-hander Danielle de Bruijn scoring with 26 seconds left.
snippet: For a third consecutive Olympics, the American women came up short of a gold medal in the most heartbreaking fashion with the Dutch left-hander Danielle de Bruijn scoring with 26 seconds left.
